Omega SG-13/1000-LY11 has a nominal undeformed resistance of \(R_X = $RX\Omega\). The change in resistance is very small: if the piece of steel the gauge is bonded to stretches by \(\frac{\Delta l}{l} = 0.001\) the gauge increases resistance by only \($GF\Omega\).

Note: In this problem it is necessary to compute your answers to within 1% of the correct value.
